Approval(address,address,uint256).details: Emitted when `owner` enables `approved` to manage the `tokenId` token.

ApprovalForAll(address,address,bool).details: Emitted when `owner` enables or disables (`approved`) `operator` to manage all of its assets.

Initialized(uint8).details: Triggered when the contract has been initialized or reinitialized.

Transfer(address,address,uint256).details: Emitted when `tokenId` token is transferred from `from` to `to`.

ApplicatonApproval(address,address).notice: Event emitted on membership application approval by one of the members

MemberReputationChange(address,uint256,u.notice: Event emitted on member reputation change

NewMembership(address,uint256).notice: Event emitted on new membership start

TotalReputationChange(uint256,uint256).notice: Event emitted on total reputation change

CLOCK_MODE().notice: Machine-readable description of the clock as specified in EIP-6372.

applyForMembership(string).notice: Function used to apply to community

approveMembership(address).notice: Function for community members to approve acceptance of new member to community

delegateReputation(address,uint256).notice: Function to delegate reputation to other member

revokeReputation(address).notice: Function to revoke reputation delegation from member

startMembership().notice: Function called by new member to start membership after successful vote

withdrawUnusedDeposit(address).notice: Function for protocol team to withdraw unused membership deposit (in case of refusal)
